titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Earle Gister, Associate Dean of Academic Affairs and Chair of the Department of Acting, Yale School of Drama, Records
Gister (Earle), Associate Dean of Academic Affairs and Chair of the Department of Acting, Yale School of Drama, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:25

did.unittitle: Earle Gister, associate dean of academic affairs and chair of the Department of Acting, Yale School of Drama, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of subject files, correspondence, commencement files, and acting scene presentations documenting the activities and initiatives of Earle Gister as associate dean of academic affairs and chair of the Department of Acting in the Yale School of Drama.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 22-B (YRG 22-B), Records of the deputy, associate, and assistant deans of the Yale School of Drama.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Earle Gister, Associate Dean of Academic Affairs and Chair of the Department of Acting, Yale School of Drama, Records (RU 847). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of subject files, correspondence, commencement files, and acting scene presentations documenting the activities and initiatives of Earle Gister as associate dean of academic affairs and chair of the Department of Acting in the Yale School of Drama.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by subject.

controlaccess.subject: Acting -- Study and teaching
Deans (Education)
Universities and colleges -- Administration
controlaccess.corpname: Yale School of Drama. Dept. of Acting

did.unittitle: Subject files, correspondence, commencement files, and acting scene presentations of Earle Gister
School of Drama- General Commencement files
Correspondence and recommendations inalldepartments, arranged alphabetically
League of Professional Theatre Training Programs file (19 folders)
Ensemble Company for the Performing Arts
NEA, letter from Brad Davis re: possible proposals
NEA Artistic Director Internship Program, Report by L. Richards and memo
National Foundation for Advancement in the Arts
Office of Community and State Relations, letter re: YSD/YRT involve. in N. Haven
Paycheck receipts (legal pad pages with signatures)
Present Stage - The Actor's Space, etter from L. Richards
Priority work/rehearsal times, Gister memo to YSD
Recommendations, for students and interns (from J. Miller and E. Gister)
Red, Virginia S., letter to E. Gister
Roy Hart Theatre/R. Armstrong, letter and info.
The Arts/The Workplace Project, Arts Council of Greater New Haven
Yale China Association, Annual Report; E. Gister letters; Huang Zolin
Yale Drama Alumni Executive Committee, minutes of meeting
Yale Liaison Program, memo from Provost George May
YSD Publicity, copy of Delta Airline's Sky Magazine with article re:Drama in Universitiesincludes quote by E. Gister
